content: --विधातृ {%<ab>m.</ab>%} [अनागतं उद्दिश्य विदधाति] one who provides for the future, provident, prudent (used as the name of a fish in <ls>Pt. 1. 318</ls>; <ls>H. 4. 5</ls>); अनागतविधाता च प्रत्युत्पन्नमतिस्तथा . द्वावेतौ सुखमेधेते यद्भविष्यो विनश्यति .. (where Dr. Peterson translates the three names by ‘Mr. Provider-against-afuture-evil’, ‘Mr. Cool-head,’ and ‘Mr. what-will-be-will-be’).
